1370: Folkero was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Rabburgis at age 25 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Reynildis, at age 28.
1374: Had a son with Rabburgis, Radwardo, at age 29.
1376: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Imsoete, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Aue, at age 33.
1380: Had a son with Rabburgis, Woutermanne, at age 35.
1382: Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 5 years old.
1384: Lost daughter Kerstine when Kerstine was 0 years old.
Rabburgis gave birth to their stillborn daughter Kerstine in 1384.
1386: Lost daughter Imsoete when Imsoete was 11 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
